title: Module 2 Quiz: AI Applications for NZ SMEs

questions.question: What is the most important capability for an AI chatbot to have for customer service?
questions.questionHtml: What is the most important capability for an AI chatbot to have for customer service?

answers.text: The ability to pretend to be human convincingly
answers.textHtml: The ability to pretend to be human convincingly

answers.text: A clear path to escalate to human support when needed
answers.textHtml: A clear path to escalate to human support when needed

answers.text: The ability to handle every possible customer query
answers.textHtml: The ability to handle every possible customer query

answers.text: Multilingual capabilities in at least 10 languages
answers.textHtml: Multilingual capabilities in at least 10 languages

questions.feedback: The most important capability for a customer service chatbot is having a clear path to escalate to human support. Customers become frustrated when they can't reach a human for complex issues. Transparency about being a bot (not pretending to be human) builds trust, and no chatbot can handle every possible query.

questions.question: What should SMEs do BEFORE automating a business process with AI?
questions.questionHtml: What should SMEs do BEFORE automating a business process with AI?

answers.text: Purchase the most advanced AI tools available
answers.textHtml: Purchase the most advanced AI tools available

answers.text: Hire a dedicated AI specialist
answers.textHtml: Hire a dedicated AI specialist

answers.text: Fix the process first—automating a broken process just produces bad results faster
answers.textHtml: Fix the process first—automating a broken process just produces bad results faster

answers.text: Train all staff on AI fundamentals
answers.textHtml: Train all staff on AI fundamentals

questions.feedback: Before automating any process, you should fix it first. AI makes processes faster, not better. If a process is broken or inefficient, automating it simply produces bad results more quickly. Understanding and improving the underlying process before applying AI ensures you get meaningful benefits.

questions.question: According to the lesson, what is a key limitation of AI financial forecasting?
questions.questionHtml: According to the lesson, what is a key limitation of AI financial forecasting?

answers.text: AI forecasting is too expensive for SMEs
answers.textHtml: AI forecasting is too expensive for SMEs

answers.text: AI learns from historical patterns and may not account for future changes you haven't made yet
answers.textHtml: AI learns from historical patterns and may not account for future changes you haven't made yet

answers.text: AI cannot integrate with NZ accounting platforms
answers.textHtml: AI cannot integrate with NZ accounting platforms

answers.text: AI forecasting is only accurate for large businesses
answers.textHtml: AI forecasting is only accurate for large businesses

questions.feedback: A key limitation of AI financial forecasting is that it learns from historical patterns. It doesn't know about deals in your pipeline, can't account for decisions you haven't made yet, and may miss context that affects forecasts. If your business is changing significantly, historical patterns may not predict future performance well.
